Police lieutenant colonel held a safety lesson at Berdsk school

02 Nov 2019, 19:25

Police lieutenant colonel held a safety lesson at Berdsk school
19:25 11/02/2019 0

The event was held in anticipation of the autumn holidays, according to the regional Ministry of Internal Affairs.

At the meeting with the schoolchildren came the deputy head of the Russian Interior Ministry’s department for Berdsk, lieutenant colonel of the internal service Sergey Volgin. He held a safety lesson with first graders. Schoolchildren learned about how to behave with strangers, what a safe route is, how to behave correctly on the roadway and near it, what safety measures must be followed while staying home without adults.
According to the policeman, the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia in the Novosibirsk Region reports that special attention should be paid to child safety before the holidays, when children often spend a certain part of their time without adults.
At the end of the lesson, Sergey Volgin answered first-graders questions on security, and took pictures with schoolchildren.
